energy.usef.brp.service.business

Class BrpPlanboardValidatorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.brp.service.business.BrpPlanboardValidatorService

  • public class BrpPlanboardValidatorService
extends Object
    This service class implements the business logic related to the DSO part of the d-prognosis reception.

      • validateAPlanSequenceNumber

        public void validateAPlanSequenceNumber(Prognosis prognosis)
                                 throws BusinessValidationException
        Validate the sequence number of a incoming prognosis. If the incoming prognosis is a updated version of an existing one, its sequence number should be greater than the previous one.
        Parameters:
        prognosis -
        Throws:
        BusinessValidationException

      • validatePlanboardHasBeenInitialized

        public void validatePlanboardHasBeenInitialized(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                List<PTU> ptus)
                                         throws BusinessValidationException
        Validates if every PTU is present in the planboard (i.e. has been initialized in a first place).
        Parameters:
        period - LocalDate period.
        ptus - List of PTU.
        Throws:
        BusinessValidationException - if any given PTU is not in the database.

        Parameters:
